price: (34) Or He could destroy them[1424] for what they earned; but He pardons much.
arabic: أَوۡ يُوبِقۡهُنَّ بِمَا كَسَبُواْ وَيَعۡفُ عَن كَثِيرٖ
footnotes: [1424]- Meaning that Allāh could sink the ships by means of violent winds.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: aw yūbiq'hunna bimā kasabū wayaʿfu ʿan kathīrin
